title: Cloud Text-to-Speech - Custom Voice Overview
abstract:
# Cloud Text-to-Speech - Custom Voice Overview
Text-to-Speech now offers the Custom Voice feature. Custom Voice allows you to train a custom voice model using your own studio-quality audio recordings to create a unique voice. You can use your custom voice to synthesize audio using the Text-to-Speech API.
**Warning:** Custom Voice is a private feature. The online documentation is publicly available, but you will not be able to implement Custom Voice until you [contact a member of the sales team](https://cloud.google.com/contact) .
See the [Text-to-Speech Custom Voice documentation](/text-to-speech/custom-voice/docs)
